title: Whoever does these splash arts.....
body:
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xXmvSDgAlno/VZQ31uIe9sI/AAAAAAAAsxs/E8SvJJPqj0c/s640/Gnar_Splash_2.jpg
Needs to get a raise, this freaking splash is already my favorite splash in the game just for how well detailed it is (second goes to Winter Wonderland Lulu) these damn splashes are just too amazing. Now I have to buy Gentleman Gnar 200% more than I planned, I didn't know his splash art would be worth it to,  I was going to buy him just for the look.

TL;DR: Words, thanks for the epic splash to make this skin even more "WURF"

replies.body: It was the ever-talented Jean Go!  An equally amazing artist. Seriously, our splash team is stacked. I am in awe of them all >:D
Yeah, Red Response! Props to jean for being such an great artist, tell he/she that I said they're the bomb diggity
She saw this thread and was really happy!

Hey! Seeing as Rioter Kindlejack couldn't be nice enough to share more info, I guess I have to! Tsk tsk, shame on you Kindlejack! (jk jk)

Jean Go is literally one of the most amazing artists I have ever seen and I aspire to be able to draw and paint as well as she can some day! Jean Go also created the Star Guardian Lux Splash, Warring Kingdoms Nidalee Splash, and the log in screen for the most recent Harrowing event!

You can see more of her beautiful work here http://cargocollective.com/jeango and here http://jeangoart.blogspot.com/

>Seriously, our splash team is stacked. I am in awe of them all >:D

Since they seem to be two different teams, have you guys considered using some of the skin splash teams power tp bolster up the one that does the updated classic splashes? The splashes for the skins really seem to almost always be on point, but some of the new classic skins have been pretty embarrassing downgrades over their old ones (i.e. Katarina/Janna/Ahri) which i reckon might be due to less ressources given to that team.

The new Anivia splash however looks pretty great, so maybe you have solved that problem already! It would just be nice if things like the hilariously forced PoV in the Katarina splash wouldn't happen again in the future.
All the splash art is done by the one team.

Huh, that's actually surprising, given the large difference in quality between skin splashes and updated classic splashes over the last year... then again, it might have simply been a problem of putting out too many of them in too short of a time frame.

As I said, I think the new Anivia splash looks pretty amazing, so I just hope the team will be able to stick to that standard of quality in the future when it comes to base splashes. :)

I think it's always going to come down to the individual artist as well. While there is a a lot of feedback/paintovers given by the team ultimately each artist makes the final decisions on their work and so there's always a little variation in the style.
If only the balance team could take note.
new taric splash art where ?.
i noticed thought that his monocle is on the wrong eye and hid card is missing too,
https://media.giphy.com/media/10jRHyuxV1FsvC/giphy.gif

LaughingFish! You've made it to the awesome splash party!
http://www.reactiongifs.us/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/minions_fangirling_despicable_me.gif
http://onwardstate.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/conan-bowing.gif
All of their recent splashes have been top-notch, art team always delivers on that end.
Eh, Kat and Trist splashes could have been better.
Pretty sure there's a different team for skins and base arts. I could be wrong though.

> [{quoted}](name=MoltresRising,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=eny3EEKq,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-07-01T20:39:59.527+0000)
>
> Eh, Kat and Trist splashes could have been better.

Trist I think they just tried their best with because her in game model is so weird and Disney looking, but kat just needs a lot of touch ups to proportions and angles.
My problem with Kats is that her pose reminds me of the Flash. It looks more like someone running at superhuman speeds than anything else.

Sigh. 

Can't believe people would pay for a white gnar with a top hat. This is going to be the next Debonair Ezreal, with all the buyers being the most toxic of his playerbase talking about how much swag & class they have and how they are high society and they look down on non-skin plebs etc. So many other champs that need the skin more.
Not sure if srs or troll

He's 100% serious. This guy is like this on every post he slightly disagrees with xD..

On the other hand, that Gnar concept is awesome.
It's cuz he Jelly
My only complaint about the skin is that it should be legendary with a new voiceover where Gnar actually talks...
Holy crap, me and some other dude were talking about this earlier in the week, it would be adorable to hear him say Demaglio in a gentleman accent.
I just wish they'd redo old skin splash arts now... Riot Girl and Firefighter Tristana need some love :c

{{champion:150}} "Twitch, when did you look like this?"

I see its time to buy some skins
Full speed ahead to the store!
http://ericsmithrocks.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/money-shovel.gif
TY Riot for this awesome skin. I love Gnar {{champion:150}}  <3
Rito we need you to release three more gentleman skins so we can have a full gentleman team
Gentleman skarner you say.
Gentleman Cho Gath Mid, Gentleman Gnar Top, Aristocrat Vayne ADC, Tahm Kench (he's pretty gentlemanly right?) Sup, and then... Madame Rek Sai Jg! :O
I really love new splash arts but their style are competely different . It's like people are sharing their fan arts and Riot is accepting them.

Logged into add this. It's a higher quality then the default picture itself. [Here is a direct download of the picture](http://tinypic.com/r/jkzu9t/8)

It took like 10 seconds to make it higher quality, anyways.
They have been really good, imo the {{champion:55}} splash still looks a little shifty.

{{champion:150}} "Kat, madame, you seem to be in an awkward position."
{{champion:55}} "CALL THE AMBULANCE"

(Edit: Yeah, shes bent in a very strange shape but I still prefer this one)
Ooh Ooh, make one one for a new {{champion:98}} skin
I love how his tail is just enough in the picture that it teases me and makes me want to mash my face all up in it! =3
This splash art is so cute, I might have an orgasm.
cutegasm* {{champion:150}}
topaz vivacity bb
There are some splash arts that just really register with individuals.  This one looks well done.  Kudos to the artist.

I love the little details too:
A smashed giant cup
A painting with Mega Gnar on it
Smashed Mirror
Torn sofa

This is all I have to say about this new skin for Gnar.

*COLLAPSES*  Cuteness...too much...

I agree, and it's also adorable! Sadly, this skin (and Gnar in general) doesn't look as cute in game, but that's 100% fine! We don't play league for good graphics (though they are welcome!), we play to have fun and/or win. Definitely my new favourite splash. Squeeeeee!

Did anyone else notices the references to Beauty and the Beast? (The chipped teacup and clawed painting in the background) This skin splash is amazing and since I got Gnar from the mystery champion they sent out I will be getting it!
I wish it would be bigger, so it fit better as a background on my computer {{item:3070}}
It looks amazing! Maybe ill get it too :D
man who ever did that splash art should get a promotion cause alote of people (even if never played gnar) will rush on this skin cause the splash is freaking awesome!

Can I have this skin now? My eyes are melting from cute.....
I HAVE A MIGHTY NEED!
